QuestData.Title: Tools of the Trade
QuestData.Description: I used to visit here before the barrier was raised. While the ruling council and the Grand Magistrix argued and politicked I watched the caretakers perform their rituals and venerate the dead.$b$bI would honor the spirits here one last time. I am headed to the tombs. If some of the sacred oils, burial shrouds, or incense survived the ages then bring them to me.
QuestData.RewardText: Truly a testament to our preservation techniques. I had lost hope that anything would have survived looting and the sands of time.$b$bThe ancestors will be pleased with this.
